name: ClickBait
description:
<b>A Tropical Guava Banana Pineapple Smoothie.<b>

This is a delicious summer vape.

In the inhale you can clearly taste the pink creamie Guava with that soft sweet banana.

In the exhale you get that sweet tart juicy pineapple you can tastes the little pieces of pineapple.

Come on guys I'm so confident of this mix that I can guarantee that you will love it.

So push that mix bottom!

Keep mixing!
author: BebopGear

reviews.text: The only thing missing that would complete the recipe is if you were so kind to save us tremendous time and effort by linking a random crappy product from Amazon. That way the rubes will buy it and you sit back and collect pure profit. Then the recipe would be true to its name.
